scripts.build: npm run build:pug && npm run build:scss && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: copyfiles -u 1 src/*.svg dist/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/*.js dist/
scripts.watch: npm run watch:pug & npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:assets
scripts.watch:assets: copyfiles -u 1 src/*.svg dist/ --watch & copyfiles -u 1 src/*.js dist/ --watch
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.build-and-serve: npm run build && npm run serve
